## ğŸ“– User Story

**As a** [specific persona from 02-user-personas/],
**I want to** [specific action or capability],
**so that** [business value or user outcome].

**Example:**
- **As a** Portfolio Manager,
- **I want to** view all unrealized gains/losses for a portfolio in one dashboard,
- **so that** I can quickly assess portfolio performance and make rebalancing decisions.
